snippet: The Yankees planned to give their shortstop occasional breaks, but the combination of his excellent start and his teammates’ slumps makes that difficult.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees planned to give their shortstop occasional breaks, but the combination of his excellent start and his teammates’ slumps makes that difficult.

headline.seo: Derek Jeter May Be Too Hot to Sit
headline.main: With Jeter Hot, and Other Yankees Not, It May Be Too Hard to Rest Him
headline.print_headline: With Jeter Hot, and Other Yankees Not, It May Be Too Hard to Rest Him
